traits.name: Master of Shadows
traits.desc: If the Maskhound hides, while shadowed, or is behind half-cover or more, the Maskhound goes invisible until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Maskhound makes two claw attacks, and one tail attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Mute
actions.desc: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. The whispy tendrils from the Maskhound's torso wrap around the target. The target is silenced, and blinded for 1 turn.
